item.title: Vivi: After working for three years, I went to Carnegie Mellon to restart my life
item.author: xiangaoole@gmail.com (Harold Gao)
item.description:
** Editor’s click: vivi is my classmate in the character interview class. Seeing her self -introduction, I was attracted to it all at once, and then learned more about her stories about her through Xiaohongshu. Finally, at 11 am in Beijing time, at 8 pm in San Francisco time, crossing half of the earth, we started this online interview.

2023 is the fourth year of Vivi working in the United States. Now she is a product designer in Microsoft. Her Cloudai team is connected to Microsoft’s new generation of artificial intelligence products to the project of the cloud service platform Azure. The era of a national AI has come.
